mapper.select: SELECT bc.member_no,bc.board_no,bc.comment_no, m.member_nickname, bc.comment_content, bc.comment_write_date FROM board b JOIN board_comment bc ON b.board_no = bc.board_no JOIN member m ON bc.member_no = m.member_no WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board_comment set comment_content = #{commentContent} where comment_no = #{commentNo}
